title: Man Who Took Nancy Pelosi’s Lectern in Jan. 6 Capitol Riot Is Sentenced to 75 Days in Prison
sub_head: Photo of Adam Johnson in the Capitol Rotunda with the House speaker’s lectern was a widely  circulated image from the day
body:
A Florida man who took House Speaker Nancy Pelosi’s lectern during the Jan. 6, 2021, riot at the U.S. Capitol was sentenced to 75 days in prison on Friday.
Adam Johnson traveled to Washington, D.C., to attend a rally as Congress met early last year to certify Joe Biden’s win over then-President Donald Trump. Mr. Johnson was one of the hundreds of Trump supporters who later stormed the Capitol to stop the session, according to federal prosecutors.
